posts.title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order gets PS5 and Xbox Series X update
posts.body: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order is over a one year old but if you need a reason to play it again (or for the first time), Respawn has you covered. A brand new PS5 and Xbox Series update has been released, adding 60FPS and new resolution options.

posts.title: Madden is teasing something related to Spongebob for some reason
posts.body: 2021 just started and it’s already getting really weird. The official Madden Twitter account is teasing something Spongebob related for Thursday, January 7th. We really only have two possible ideas for what this could be.

posts.title: Cyberpunk 2077 saves get corrupted if you collect too much stuff
posts.body: It feels like every new day we learn something new that is bad about Cyberpunk 2077. This time, PC players discovered that their save files become corrupted after reaching a certain file size. Worst of all, it’s not repairable.
